meanings.definition: A group of antibiotics derived from rifamycin B.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed rifamycin to treat the infection.
meanings.sent2: Rifamycin is commonly used to fight bacterial illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of rifamycin because it was their worst enemy.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against infection, rifamycin was the mighty warrior.
meanings.sent5: The red color of rifamycin capsules reminded me of the blood of bacteria it fought.

meanings.definition: Any of various antibiotics derived from rifamycin B.
meanings.sent1: My friend is allergic to rifamycin, so she can't take certain antibiotics.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained the different types of rifamycin antibiotics available.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party when they heard rifamycin was out of stock.
meanings.sent4: Her resistance to illness was like a shield made of rifamycin.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of rifamycin against bacteria was unmatched in the medical world.
